bio.part1: Computer Science graduate currently studying Cybersecurity.
bio.part2: I work on complete web projects, from frontend development with React and other modern technologies, to creating robust APIs with Node.js and Python.
bio.part3: I have a strong passion for cybersecurity and always integrate security best practices into every project I develop.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.answer1: I offer full stack web development services, from designing responsive user interfaces to creating robust and secure APIs.
faq.question2: How much does a website cost?
faq.answer2: The cost depends on the complexity of the project. Contact me with details to receive a personalized quote.
faq.question3: How long does it take to complete a project?
faq.answer3: Timelines vary based on project size and complexity. Generally, a simple website takes 2-3 weeks, while more complex projects can take 1-3 months.
faq.answer4: Yes, I primarily work remotely, but I'm available for in-person meetings when necessary, especially in the Bologna area.
